content.raw:
On the Track X constellation, unless I'm doing something wrong I can't get a task to run properly.  This is what error I get after it sits there trying to start a launch file:

"Practice 2 Task failed to start: vrc_netwatcher start/running, process 30659 [router start_sim.bash] simulator start_sim.bash returned non-zero Warning: Permanently added '75.126.118.234' (ECDSA) to the list of known hosts. stop: Unknown instance: cloudsim/start_sim.bash: line 5: kill: (30653) - No such process stop: Unknown instance: Warning: Permanently added '10.0.0.51' (ECDSA) to the list of known hosts. Logs uploaded to the portal"
content.html:

"Practice 2 Task failed to start: vrc_netwatcher start/running, process 30659 [router start_sim.bash] simulator start_sim.bash returned non-zero Warning: Permanently added '75.126.118.234' (ECDSA) to the list of known hosts. stop: Unknown instance: cloudsim/start_sim.bash: line 5: kill: (30653) - No such process stop: Unknown instance: Warning: Permanently added '10.0.0.51' (ECDSA) to the list of known hosts.
